info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 4:32AM EDT until March 24 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected higher elevations above 1000 feet. Total snow and sleet accumulation of up to one inch and ice accumulation of around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Elevations above 1000 feet in northern Saratoga and southeast Warren Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to noon EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute. Some power outages will be possible due to downed tree limbs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mainly plain rain is expected for valley locations below 1000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
